description: Video of the three officers beating the music producer at his studio has caused an outcry in France.
title: Paris police officers suspended over beating of black music producer
title_page: Paris police officers suspended over beating of black music producer - BBC News
maintext: As he arrived at police headquarters on Thursday with his lawyer to file a complaint, Michel told reporters: "People who should have been protecting me attacked me. I did nothing to deserve this. I just want these three people to be punished according to the law."
